OrgName: Fox Entertainment Group, Inc., and its affiliates Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation; Twentieth Century Fox Home Entertainment LLC; Fox Networks Group; Fox International Channels (US), Inc.; and Fox Latin American Channel LLC
PPLoc: On the Organization intranet; see link below
activities: Fox Entertainment Group, Inc., and its affiliates Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation; Twentieth Century Fox Home Entertainment LLC; Fox Networks Group; Fox International Channels (US), Inc.; and Fox Latin American Channel LLC use personal information from business units in the EEA and Switzerland for the following purposes:  personnel administration; compensation; benefits administration; public relations and award programs; computer systems access and security; to satisfy legal and regulatory requirements; staffing; safety, occupational health and medical records administration; communications; in connection with corporate initiatives; compliance with legal obligations; and ensuring the proper functioning of employee databases.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Human Resources Data - data covered may include manually processed data
recoursemech: To ensure compliance with the Safe Harbor Principles, the Organization will commit to: (a) cooperate with those Data Protection Authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (“DPAs”) of EEA Member States and Switzerland with jurisdiction in the investigation and resolution of complaints, and comply with appropriate advice given by those DPAs; (b) periodically review and verify the Organization’s compliance with the Safe Harbor Principles; and (c) remedy issues arising out of any failure to comply with the Safe Harbor Principles.
